root.name: Star Wars: Jedi Arena
root.description: OverviewThe object of the game was to fire lightning bolts from the training remote at your opponent. The bolts could be blocked with the lightsaber. If the player failed to block, the bolt would hit their shield. I have a Lite Sabor! Hitting the shield enough times would make a hole and leave the opponent vulnerable. A hit scored in this manner awarded the attacker a point. Occasionally the remote would go crazy and fire lightning in an erratic manner. The game used the paddle controls.There was also a PLug'N'Play version released before the 2600 port.
